overview: Kind-hearted Claire Robbins thinks she's found the perfect job caring for the baby of an uber hip lesbian couple. She soon discovers that Jessica, a tattoo shop owner, is struggling to keep her relationship from falling apart. Her lover Jill, a professor, is becoming more and more withdrawn. Claire soon finds herself struggling to help Jessica while becoming entangled in the couple's bizarre world. Kimberly Kane plays Professor Smyte, a colleague of Jill's from the university, who takes a special interest in young Claire, and Kleio Valentien plays a porn star with nothing to lose...
title: Lesbian Babysitters 13
